description.value: Primary Energy: Earth 8 (major terrain disruption) Supporting Energy: Space 7 (medium range + 50ft radius + 1 minute) Range: Medium, 60 ft. (50-foot radius) Duration: 1 minute Total Cost: 15 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Earth Potential + Earth Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: Ground shakes violently in area. All creatures make [[/save type=reflex]]. Compare your weaving successes to their save successes. If you have more, creatures fall Prone. Structures may collapse (GM discretion). Area becomes difficult terrain. Applies Effects: prone; restrained Saving Throw: Reflex (to avoid falling prone) Success Scaling: 0 = no effect, 1 = 1 round (25ft radius), 2 = full effect (50ft radius, 1 minute), 3 = 100ft radius, 4 = major structural damage, fissures open (200ft radius) Prone + Restrained Condition (at Net 4): Targets not only fall Prone but may become partially buried (Restrained) if near collapsing structures.
